description:
Have you ever wanted to become a 3D animator? Do you like games and movies and want to work in those industries? Ever wonder where you need to start? This course is it.

This course will walk you through the basics of the industry standard software for 3D animation, 3ds Max by Autodesk. You will learn how to use the software and basic animation techniques that will give you a solid foundation for becoming an animator as a profession or as a hobby.

This course is an introductory level course for those who have never used 3ds Max and/or who have no experience in 3D animation. No prior experience is required.
title: Introduction to 3DS Max
